title: wine_Pojer_&_Sandri_2005_Besler_Biank_White_(Vigneti_delle_Dolomiti)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 96795.
country: Italy.
description: From the Val di Cembra valley hidden deep within the snow-capped Dolomites comes this blend of Sauvignon, Pinot Bianco, Manzoni bianco, Kerner and Riesling that has aged carefully in the bottle (for a late release). Tertiary aromas of candied fruit, dusty mineral, honey and ginger give the wine a smooth and elegant personality. This wine is part of a small elite of Italian whites that shows this impressive longevity..
designation: Besler Biank.
points: 90.
